articles.title: Anti-obesity drugs' side effects: what we know so far - Nature.com
articles.description: Recent studies evaluate risks associated with drugs such as Wegovy and Mounjaro.

articles.author: Science X
articles.title: Common drug can improve hand osteoarthritis symptoms, finds study - Medical Xpress
articles.description: Relief could be on the way for people with painful hand osteoarthritis after a Monash University and Alfred Health-led study found an affordable existing drug can help. Until now there has been no effective treatment.

articles.title: Britain has one of the worst obesity rates in Europe. Why? - Financial Times

articles.title: Early and Empirical High-Dose Cryoprecipitate for Hemorrhage After Traumatic Injury - JAMA Network
articles.description: This clinical trial examines whether early, empirical, high-dose cryoprecipitate, in addition to standard major hemorrhage protocols, would improve survival in the first 28 days after hospital admission following injury.
